overview: Have you ever wondered if the wives are hornier on the other side of the fence? Get ready to find out as two husbands hand over their keys, homes and women to each other and find out exactly how the other half screws. These traded wives get thrown into every new position imaginable, learning how to feel their way through every new 'job' that cums their way.
tagline: Have you ever wondered if the wives are hornier on the other side of the fence?
title: Official Wife Swap Parody
